## [Category 1]

- [ ] CHK001 Code is readable and intent-revealing (names, structure,
  and control flow are clear).
- [ ] CHK002 No dead code, commented-out blocks, or unused abstractions
  remain.
- [ ] CHK003 Changes are covered by appropriate automated tests
  (unit/integration) and tests are clear to read.

## [Category 2]

- [ ] CHK004 Work is organized into small, focused, reversible commits
  with meaningful messages.
- [ ] CHK005 Pre-commit safety gate passed: code compiles, full test
  suite green, and no new static analysis issues.
- [ ] CHK006 Any deviations from the constitution are documented with
  rationale and, if needed, follow-up tasks.

## Notes

- Check items off as completed: `[x]`
- Add comments or findings inline
- Link to relevant resources or documentation
- Items are numbered sequentially for easy reference
